description: The BLC segment contains data necessary to communicate patient abstract blood information used for billing and reimbursement purposes. This segment is repeating to report blood product codes and the associated blood units.

1.name: Blood Product Code
1.description: This field reports the blood product code. Refer to User-defined Table 0426 - Blood product code for suggested values

2.name: Blood Amount
2.description: This field indicates the quantity and units administered for the blood code identified in field 1, for example, 2^pt. Standard ISO or ANSI units, as defined in Chapter 7 are recommended.
